name: readium-js

scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:submodule && npm run prepare:local
scripts.prepare:local: (npm outdated || echo outdated) && (npm ci || npm install) && npm run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:yarn:all: yarn run prepare:yarn:submodule && yarn run prepare:yarn:local
scripts.prepare:yarn:local: (yarn outdated || echo outdated) && yarn install && yarn run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:submodule: cd readium-shared-js && npm run prepare:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.prepare:yarn:submodule: cd readium-shared-js && yarn run prepare:yarn:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.clean: (yarn --version || echo noyarn) && node --version && npm --version && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/* && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js api-docs/*
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
scripts.preversioning: node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/_multiple-bundles && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/_single-bundle && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/XXX
scripts.versioning: node build-config/versioning.js build-output/version.json && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/version.json build-output/XXX/
scripts.build:scripts: npm run versioning && npm run build:scripts:multiple && npm run build:scripts:single
scripts.postbuild:scripts: node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/XXX && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/version.json && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js && ( node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map build-output/ && ( node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map ) || echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." )
scripts.postbuild:scripts:multiple: node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js readium-shared-js/node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js build-output/ && mv build-output/r.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/RequireJS.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/RequireJS.js.src.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.src.js
scripts.http: npm run genPluginsConfig && npm run httpServe
scripts.dowatch: node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/watch/cli.js "npm run build && node readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/webbrowser.js && node ./readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js open_webbrowser.js" dev/ js/ readium-shared-js/js/ readium-shared-js/plugins/ readium-shared-js/js/
